name: luascript
description: Complete JavaScript-to-Lua transpiler with advanced runtime optimization - Tony Yoka's Unified Team Implementation

scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:phase1 && node tests/test_memory_management.js
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:edge && npm run test:enhanced && npm run test:legacy && npm run test:parity
scripts.test:all-ir: npm run harness && npm run test:extended && npm run ir:validate:all
scripts.test:analysis: tsx --test src/agents/resolver-agent.test.ts src/agents/auditor-agent.test.ts src/core/symbol-table.test.ts src/ide/resolution-diagnostics.test.ts src/language/parser.test.ts
scripts.test:core: node -e "const {UnifiedSystemTests} = require('./test/test_unified_system.js'); const suite = new UnifiedSystemTests(); suite.testBasicTranspilation().then(() => suite.testRuntimeExecution()).then(() => console.log('Core tests complete'));"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const {UnifiedSystemTests} = require('./test/test_unified_system.js'); const suite = new UnifiedSystemTests(); suite.testPerformanceTools().then(() => console.log('Performance tests complete'));"
scripts.test:integration: node -e "const {UnifiedSystemTests} = require('./test/test_unified_system.js'); const suite = new UnifiedSystemTests(); suite.testFullPipeline().then(() => console.log('Integration tests complete'));"
scripts.benchmark: node -e "const {UnifiedLuaScript} = require('./src/unified_luascript.js'); const system = UnifiedLuaScript.createProduction(); system.initializeComponents().then(() => system.benchmark('let x = 5;', 100)).then(result => console.log('Benchmark:', result));"
scripts.validate: npm run test:victory && echo 'LUASCRIPT VALIDATION COMPLETE - VICTORY ACHIEVED!'
scripts.ir:validate:all: npm run -s ir:validate && npm run -s ir:validate:schema
scripts.ir:repro: bash -lc 'npm run -s ir:report >/dev/null 2>&1 && cp reports/canonical_ir_status.md reports/canonical_ir_status.1.md && npm run -s ir:report >/dev/null 2>&1 && diff -u reports/canonical_ir_status.1.md reports/canonical_ir_status.md'
scripts.golden:gen:example:
bash -lc 'cat <<
JS
function demo(x){ return x + 1; }
JS
 | node scripts/generate_golden_from_js.js demo -'
scripts.test:quick-ugmp: npm run -s test:core && npm run -s test:parity && npm run -s ir:report
scripts.test:roadmap: node tests/status/status_alignment.test.js && node tests/quality/static_warnings_budget.test.js && node tests/ci/gates_smoke.test.js && node tests/ir/consolidation_equivalence.test.js
scripts.test:compatibility:all: npm run test:compatibility && npm run test:extension:examples
scripts.test:extension:examples: node -e "const ex = require('./examples/extensions/example-transforms'); const {CompatibilityValidator} = require('./src/extensions/api'); ex.getAllExamples().forEach(t => { const r = CompatibilityValidator.validate(t); console.log((r.compatible ? 'âœ“' : 'âœ—'), t.name); });"
scripts.coverage:full: npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:check
scripts.codex:done: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.codex/signal.txt', 'done'); console.log('âœ… Signal sent: Codex will validate now')"
scripts.codex:cancel: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.codex/signal.txt', 'cancel'); console.log('âŒ Signal sent: Codex will cancel')"
scripts.codex:status: node -e "try { console.log(require('fs').readFileSync('.codex/state.json', 'utf8')) } catch { console.log('No active Codex work') }"
scripts.codex:logs: node -e "try { const lines = require('fs').readFileSync('.codex/codex.log', 'utf8').split('\n'); console.log(lines.slice(-50).join('\n')) } catch { console.log('No Codex logs') }"
scripts.codex:reset: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.unlinkSync('.codex/state.json'); fs.unlinkSync('.codex/telemetry.jsonl') } catch {} console.log('âœ… Codex state reset')"
scripts.sync-status: gh run list --workflow gemini-pr-review.yml --workflow codex-test-gates.yml --limit 10 | head -20
scripts.coordination:status: npm run -s sync-status && echo '' && npm run -s codex:status
scripts.codex:validate:local: npm run harness && npm run ir:validate:all && npm run test:parity
scripts.verify:core: npm run harness && npm run ir:validate:all && npm run test:parity && npm run test:determinism && node tests/test_destructuring.js && node tests/test_destructuring_edge_cases.js
scripts.refactor:validate: node -e "const {ASTValidator} = require('./src/validation/ast-validator'); const {IRValidator} = require('./src/validation/ir-validator'); console.log('âœ… Validators loaded');"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:core && npm run lint:extended && npm run lint:backends && npm run lint:general
scripts.refactor:all: npm run refactor:validate && npm run format:check && npm run refactor:lint && npm run static:warnings && npm run refactor:phase3
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run test:roadmap && npm run ci:gates

author: Tony Yoka's Unified Team (Lead: Tony Yoka, Steve Jobs, Donald Knuth, PS2/PS3 Specialists, 32+ Developers)

architecture.advanced_features: OOP, Pattern Matching, Type System, Macros
